description: Isaac Jareth is a 22-year-old, 5'5" (5'7" in heels) omnisexual fashion designer with brown skin, blue eyes, and short, wavy purple hair.  He has a colorful bandage across his nose and right cheek, black cat ears and tail, and a black choker.  Formerly a biker gang leader, he now enjoys a friendly relationship with his former rivals. He's close friends with Matthew, an Inumimi-harpie hybrid, and Tresin, a vampire, and harbors unrequited feelings for both.
